amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $3 million provided for the National Historical Preservation Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the National Historical Preservation Fund by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Gingrey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
